short_summary: Fabrication and delivery of stiff legged derricks with winches, in accordance with Canada’s engineered design.  Deliverables to be received by October 31, 2025.
description: The Department of Fisheries and Oceans Canada is inviting tenders for the fabrication and delivery of stiff legged derricks with winches.  The derricks must be designed and fabricated in accordance with Canada’s engineered design specifications.  The delivery terms are FOB (Free on Board) and the modal terms are marine.  Deliverables are to be received by the Department of Fisheries and Oceans Canada by October 31, 2025. The department will only accept electronic bids, which should be awarded based on the lowest cost per point.  The procurement will be held under Standard Contract for the Acquisition of Goods.  The total purchase price is estimated to be CAD 3645.
